pkgmetadata.longdescription: FFmpegwrapper~~~~~~~~~~~~~FFmpegWrapper is a small wrapper for the ffmpeg encoder. You can appendCodec, Filters and other OptionStores to the FFmpeg class and then run theresulting command.>>> from ffmpegwrapper import FFmpeg, Input, Output, VideoCodec, VideoFilter>>> codec = VideoCodec('webm')>>> input_video = Input('old')>>> output_video = Output('new', codec)>>> FFmpeg('ffmpeg', input_video, output_video)<FFmpeg ['ffmpeg', '-i', 'old', '-vcodec', 'webm', 'new']>
